General.Name: Rainbow Polikarbonat Sanayi Ticaret AS
General.Description: Rainbow Polikarbonat A.S. engages in the manufacture and sale of chemicals, petroleum, rubber, and plastic products in Turkey. It offers polycarbonate roof panel, rainbow greca panel, polycarbonate H and U shape, and perforated polycarbonate panel. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Melikgazi, Turkey.
General.Address: Kayseri Organize Sanayi Mahallesi 20, Melikgazi, Turkey
